attributes.action: personally intervene and reverse the mean spirited decision to deny Right to Remain to Ghurkas who retired from the Army pre-1997
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the outstanding service to this country by the Ghurka Regiments, both historically and currently, it beggars belief that, as well as insulting those who retired prior to 1997 with derisory pensions, a more than mean - spirited decision to deport them has now been taken.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
